author: Brian Turner
method: Put the cashews into a dry frying pan and fry over a low heat until slightly browned on all sides.  Add the butter, Worcestershire sauce, sugar and spices and fry for 2-3 minutes. Pour into a small bowl and leave to cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: 75g/2½oz cashews,  25g/1oz butter,  1½ tbsp Worcestershire sauce,  1 tbsp soft brown sugar,  pinch ground ginger,  pinch ground allspice,  pinch paprika
